title.en: Human Choice and Rebellion Against God

en: God gives clear guidance, but human beings are free to choose.
This passage shows how deception, desire, and disobedience enter human life.

lines: The serpent was more crafty than any of the wild animals the Lord God had made.

question.en: What do you notice about how deception, choice, and responsibility appear in this story?
